name: GS Boyz
description: '''GS Boyz''' (explicitly '''G-Spot Boyz''') are an American [[snap music|snap]] group from [[Arlington, Texas]], formed in 2005. They are best known for their 2008 debut single "[[Stanky Legg]]," which peaked within the top 50 of the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. The song was re-released as a commercial single by [[Yung Joc]]'s [[Yung Joc#Other ventures|Swagg Team Entertainment]] in a joint venture with [[Battery Records (hip hop)|Battery]] and [[J Records]] after charting. Their follow up single, "[[Booty Dew]]" was released the following year. In September 2017, they released the single "Off Top".
